title: Implement Emoji Icons for Devlog Fields
description: Add comprehensive emoji mapping utilities for devlog core fields (status, priority, type) to enhance GitHub issue display and make them more visually appealing. This will provide a clear visual language for devlog entries across different contexts (web UI, GitHub issues, etc.)

notes.content: Successfully implemented comprehensive emoji mappings for devlog fields. All functionality is working correctly including GitHub integration with emoji-enhanced titles.
notes.codeChanges: Created emoji mapping utilities with support for multiple styles, integrated with GitHub mapper for enhanced issue titles, added React components for web UI, and fixed refactoring issue with duplicate normalizeConfig methods

context.businessContext: Enhanced visual communication helps users quickly identify and categorize devlog entries. Emoji icons provide universal, language-independent visual cues that improve user experience across platforms, especially in GitHub where text-heavy issue lists can be hard to scan.
context.technicalContext: Create emoji mapping utilities in core package for reuse across web and GitHub integration layers. Support multiple emoji styles (default, alt, minimal) for different contexts and user preferences. Integrate with existing GitHub mapper for enhanced issue formatting.
acceptanceCriteria: Emoji mapping functions for all DevlogStatus values
Emoji mapping functions for all DevlogPriority values
Emoji mapping functions for all DevlogType values
Multiple emoji style variants (default, alt, minimal)
React component wrapper for easy usage
Integration with GitHub mapper for enhanced issue formatting
